ðŸ“– Summary: Kool is a CLI tool designed to streamline web application development using containers. It simplifies the complexities of Docker for local environments and offers a user-friendly interface for deploying to Kubernetes in the cloud. Kool provides presets for popular frameworks, making it suitable for both individual developers and teams looking to accelerate their development and deployment workflows.
